Original: Oh dear, that request... My foreboding
feeling held true. It is from that
lonely man called Dee-something.
[Page]
He calls it an "elegant hunting show,"
but I suspect he is masking his desire
for emergency reinforcements.
[Page]
Harrumph... Well then, see this Dino
for further details. I shall await
your swift return.
Translation: Oh dear, that request... My foreboding
feeling held true. It is from that
lonely man called Dee-something.
[Page]
He calls it an "elegant hunting show,"
but I suspect he is masking his desire
for emergency reinforcements.
[Page]
Harrumph... Well then, see this Dino
for further details. I shall await
your swift return.

Original: Well done, as always. How was the
"elegant hunting show"?
[Page]
By the way... Dino returned virtually
naked. Something clearly happened to
him... Do you know anything?
[Page]
At least he lived to tell the tale.
I hope he has learned his lesson
this time...
Translation: Well done, as always. How was the
"elegant hunting show"?
[Page]
By the way... Dino returned virtually
naked. Something clearly happened to
him... Do you know anything?
[Page]
At least he lived to tell the tale.
I hope he has learned his lesson
this time...

Original: You pilot your skyship to the
monster's lair you had discovered
previously.
[Page]
But the client is nowhere to be seen.
You will have to return here at
[Color:5]night[Color:0], as he specified.
Translation: You pilot your skyship to the
monster's lair you had discovered
previously.
[Page]
But the client is nowhere to be seen.
You will have to return here at
[Color:5]night[Color:0], as he specified.

Original: You follow the client's directions and
return to the nest you discovered
previously after the sun sets.
[Page]
You look around for the client, but
it is eerily quiet here...
[Page]
You wonder if you should land your
skyship and investigate the area.
Translation: You follow the client's directions and
return to the nest you discovered
previously after the sun sets.
[Page]
You look around for the client, but
it is eerily quiet here...
[Page]
You wonder if you should land your
skyship and investigate the area.

Original: [Color:5]Land and investigate?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Land and investigate?[Color:0]

Original: Wary of the unnatural silence, you
decide not to land your skyship yet.
Translation: Wary of the unnatural silence, you
decide not to land your skyship yet.

Original: After cautiously disembarking, you
begin searching for the client, but
he is nowhere to be found.
[Page]
Just as you are fearing the worst case
scenario has come to pass, you hear
a faraway scream!
[Page]
It is Dino...! But you cannot
pinpoint where his echoing voice
is coming from.
[Page]
Thinking quickly, you decide to first
head to an [Color:5]open area[Color:0] in order to
triangulate his location.
Translation: After cautiously disembarking, you
begin searching for the client, but
he is nowhere to be found.
[Page]
Just as you are fearing the worst case
scenario has come to pass, you hear
a faraway scream!
[Page]
It is Dino...! But you cannot
pinpoint where his echoing voice
is coming from.
[Page]
Thinking quickly, you decide to first
head to an [Color:5]open area[Color:0] in order to
triangulate his location.

Original: Where could the client be? In order
to triangulate his position, you
will need to [Color:5]head to an open area[Color:0].
Translation: Where could the client be? In order
to triangulate his position, you
will need to [Color:5]head to an open area[Color:0].

Original: You look down from the skyship in
search of the client and notice
something on the ground...
Translation: You look down from the skyship in
search of the client and notice
something on the ground...

Original: [Color:5]Land and investigate it?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Land and investigate it?[Color:0]

Original: Upon landing, you find a gaudy pair
of pantaloons that you suspect belongs
to your client...
[Page]
You gingerly pick up the pants and
suddenly hear water splashing, as
well as a man's desperate screams!
[Page]
It is Dino...! His voice is still hard
to pinpoint, but you believe it to be
coming from the [Color:5]north[Color:0] or the [Color:5]south[Color:0].
[Page]
The splashing you heard would also
seem to suggest that [Color:5]there is water[Color:0]
wherever he is.
Translation: Upon landing, you find a gaudy pair
of pantaloons that you suspect belongs
to your client...
[Page]
You gingerly pick up the pants and
suddenly hear water splashing, as
well as a man's desperate screams!
[Page]
It is Dino...! His voice is still hard
to pinpoint, but you believe it to be
coming from the [Color:5]north[Color:0] or the [Color:5]south[Color:0].
[Page]
The splashing you heard would also
seem to suggest that [Color:5]there is water[Color:0]
wherever he is.

Original: When you landed, you heard screams
and splashing water coming from
either the [Color:5]north[Color:0] or the [Color:5]south[Color:0].
[Page]
You deduce from the splashing sounds
that [Color:5]there is water[Color:0] near the client's
position...
Translation: When you landed, you heard screams
and splashing water coming from
either the [Color:5]north[Color:0] or the [Color:5]south[Color:0].
[Page]
You deduce from the splashing sounds
that [Color:5]there is water[Color:0] near the client's
position...

Original: Upon landing, you find a tacky shirt
that you feel sure must belong to
your client!
[Page]
You pick it up and wonder what is
going on, when you again hear screams
as well as a beast's loud footsteps!
[Page]
It is Dino...! The echoing is hard to
pinpoint, but you believe it to be
coming from the [Color:5]east[Color:0] or the [Color:5]west[Color:0]!
[Page]
Judging by the stomping sounds, the
beast seems to have [Color:5]ran up somewhere[Color:0].
What in the world is going on...?
Translation: Upon landing, you find a tacky shirt
that you feel sure must belong to
your client!
[Page]
You pick it up and wonder what is
going on, when you again hear screams
as well as a beast's loud footsteps!
[Page]
It is Dino...! The echoing is hard to
pinpoint, but you believe it to be
coming from the [Color:5]east[Color:0] or the [Color:5]west[Color:0]!
[Page]
Judging by the stomping sounds, the
beast seems to have [Color:5]ran up somewhere[Color:0].
What in the world is going on...?

Original: When you landed, you heard screams
and beastly stomping coming from
either the [Color:5]east[Color:0] or the [Color:5]west[Color:0].
[Page]
The footsteps sounded as if it [Color:5]ran up[Color:0]
somewhere... The client may be in
the same location.
Translation: When you landed, you heard screams
and beastly stomping coming from
either the [Color:5]east[Color:0] or the [Color:5]west[Color:0].
[Page]
The footsteps sounded as if it [Color:5]ran up[Color:0]
somewhere... The client may be in
the same location.

Original: Upon landing, you find a pair of
garish briefs that you realize with
a sinking feeling are your client's.
[Page]
When you pick them up with disgust,
you once again hear the client's
screams and the beast's stomping!
[Page]
It is Dino...! The echoes still mask
his location, but they seem to come
from the [Color:5]north[Color:0] or the [Color:5]south[Color:0].
[Page]
This time, it sounds as if the beast
[Color:5]ran down[Color:0] somewhere. The client may
be at the same location.
Translation: Upon landing, you find a pair of
garish briefs that you realize with
a sinking feeling are your client's.
[Page]
When you pick them up with disgust,
you once again hear the client's
screams and the beast's stomping!
[Page]
It is Dino...! The echoes still mask
his location, but they seem to come
from the [Color:5]north[Color:0] or the [Color:5]south[Color:0].
[Page]
This time, it sounds as if the beast
[Color:5]ran down[Color:0] somewhere. The client may
be at the same location.

Original: When you landed, you heard screams
and beastly stomping coming from
either the [Color:5]north[Color:0] or the [Color:5]south[Color:0].
[Page]
The footsteps sounded as if it [Color:5]ran
down[Color:0] somewhere... The client may be
in the same location.
Translation: When you landed, you heard screams
and beastly stomping coming from
either the [Color:5]north[Color:0] or the [Color:5]south[Color:0].
[Page]
The footsteps sounded as if it [Color:5]ran
down[Color:0] somewhere... The client may be
in the same location.

Original: You finally find a herd of scarlet
beasts and a scantily clad client
clinging to one of their giant horns.
[Page]
The client appears to be unconscious,
but the beasts are exhausted from the
merry chase and are not moving now.
[Page]
This would be an excellent chance to
attack them and save the client! If
you are ready, then leap into battle!
Translation: You finally find a herd of scarlet
beasts and a scantily clad client
clinging to one of their giant horns.
[Page]
The client appears to be unconscious,
but the beasts are exhausted from the
merry chase and are not moving now.
[Page]
This would be an excellent chance to
attack them and save the client! If
you are ready, then leap into battle!

Original: [Color:5]Head down into battle?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Head down into battle?[Color:0]

Original: You wonder if there is a pressing need
to rescue the foolish client... You
decide to simply watch for a while.
Translation: You wonder if there is a pressing need
to rescue the foolish client... You
decide to simply watch for a while.

Original: After you confirm the monsters' deaths
and sheathe your weapons, the mostly-
naked client emerges, cracking jokes.
[Page]
It seems he tried to lure out the
monster, but was ambushed and dragged
around, caught on the monster's horn.
[Page]
The clothes strewn about the landscape
were left deliberately, he claims,
as a message for you.
[Page]
The client eventually grows ashamed
and apologizes with slumped shoulders.
He boards his skyship for Tharsis.
[Page]
The request is now complete! All that
remains is to return to the Dancing
Peacock and report what happened.
Translation: After you confirm the monsters' deaths
and sheathe your weapons, the mostly-
naked client emerges, cracking jokes.
[Page]
It seems he tried to lure out the
monster, but was ambushed and dragged
around, caught on the monster's horn.
[Page]
The clothes strewn about the landscape
were left deliberately, he claims,
as a message for you.
[Page]
The client eventually grows ashamed
and apologizes with slumped shoulders.
He boards his skyship for Tharsis.
[Page]
The request is now complete! All that
remains is to return to the Dancing
Peacock and report what happened.

Original: You have rescued the client and slain
his tormentors! All that is left is
to report back to the bar.
Translation: You have rescued the client and slain
his tormentors! All that is left is
to report back to the bar.

Original: As you fly in search of the client,
you notice something odd about the
ground below and squint to see.
[Page]
The place looks quite ravaged. There
are beastly footprints everywhere...
[Page]
You feel sure that the client fought
the beast here... You should give it
a closer look.
Translation: As you fly in search of the client,
you notice something odd about the
ground below and squint to see.
[Page]
The place looks quite ravaged. There
are beastly footprints everywhere...
[Page]
You feel sure that the client fought
the beast here... You should give it
a closer look.

Original: When you look down, you see beastly
footprints everywhere... Could the
client be nearby?
Translation: When you look down, you see beastly
footprints everywhere... Could the
client be nearby?
